seg-source.mrk: encrypting databases

target.mrk: encrypting databases

target.mrk: new boot password

seg-source.mrk: newBootPassword

target.mrk: newBootPassword

seg-source.mrk: Function

target.mrk: Function

trans-unit.source: Specifies a new boot password for an encrypted database. A new encryption key is generated internally by the engine and the key is protected using the new boot password. The newly generated encryption key encrypts the database, including the existing data. For more information about this attribute, see "Encrypting databases with a new boot password" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies a new boot password for an encrypted database.
A new encryption key is generated internally by the engine and the key is protected using the new boot password.
The newly generated encryption key encrypts the database, including the existing data.
For more information about this attribute, see "Encrypting databases with a new boot password" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

target.mrk: Specifies a new boot password for an encrypted database.
A new encryption key is generated internally by the engine and the key is protected using the new boot password.
The newly generated encryption key encrypts the database, including the existing data.
For more information about this attribute, see "Encrypting databases with a new boot password" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

seg-source.mrk: Combining with other attributes

target.mrk: Combining with other attributes

trans-unit.source: The newBootPassword=newPassword attribute must be combined with the bootPassword=key attribute.

seg-source.mrk: The newBootPassword=newPassword attribute must be combined with the bootPassword=key attribute.

target.mrk: The newBootPassword=newPassword attribute must be combined with the bootPassword=key attribute.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the encryption provider or the encryption algorithm when you use the newBootPassword=newPassword attribute.

seg-source.mrk: You cannot change the encryption provider or the encryption algorithm when you use the newBootPassword=newPassword attribute.

target.mrk: You cannot change the encryption provider or the encryption algorithm when you use the newBootPassword=newPassword attribute.

trans-unit.source: For an existing encrypted database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can perform reencryption. Please see "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: For an existing encrypted database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can perform reencryption.
Please see "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

target.mrk: For an existing encrypted database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can perform reencryption.
Please see "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

trans-unit.source: After you change the boot password, be sure to check for SQLWarnings. The change succeeded only if there were no SQLWarnings or SQLExceptions.

seg-source.mrk: After you change the boot password, be sure to check for SQLWarnings.
The change succeeded only if there were no SQLWarnings or SQLExceptions.

target.mrk: After you change the boot password, be sure to check for SQLWarnings.
The change succeeded only if there were no SQLWarnings or SQLExceptions.

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: -- specify a new boot password for a database jdbc:derby:salesdb;bootPassword=abc1234xyz;newBootPassword=new1234xyz

seg-source.mrk: -- specify a new boot password for a database jdbc:derby:salesdb;bootPassword=abc1234xyz;newBootPassword=new1234xyz

target.mrk: -- specify a new boot password for a database jdbc:derby:salesdb;bootPassword=abc1234xyz;newBootPassword=new1234xyz
